property.name: description
property.value: This is the interface specification of a global sensor network service (GSN)

property.name: host (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) is the ip address of the server hosting the service

property.name: port (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["int"]}) is the port number of host

property.name: username (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) is the login account name for the service

property.name: password (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) is the password for the login account

property.name: path (parameter)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) is the directory to target resource requested
